title: 390. Andy & DJ CTI: Louisiana Divests From BlackRock, Biden Pledges To Ban Assault Weapons & Detonations Damaged Nord Stream Pipeline
itunes:title: 390. Andy & DJ CTI: Louisiana Divests From BlackRock, Biden Pledges To Ban Assault Weapons & Detonations Damaged Nord Stream Pipeline
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss Louisianans Treasurer John Schroder sending a letter to BlackRock explaining the state would liquidate all BlackRock's investments within three months, President Biden double downing on his pledging to ban all assault weapons, and a Swedish investigation team finding detonation damages on the Nord Stream pipeline.
